name: Agenda
description: Documents linkable from a meeting agenda node

name: Minutes
description: Documents linkable from a meeting minutes node

name: Roster
description: Document which should appear on the Roster page

name: Summary
description: Documents linkable from the Summaries pages

name: Support
description: Used by board managers in combination with the "summary" tag for general-information documents to appear on the Summaries pages

name: Help
description: Documents to be listed on user help landing page
